venue.name: DCR Blessing of the Bay Boathouse

item.description:
Flat and fast 5K road race to support a healthy Mystic River Watershed on Sunday, May 20th. http://mysticriver.org/herring-run-paddle/
Racers receive a free ORGANIC Tshirt if you register by May 1st. You can combine the 5K with a 3, 9 or 12 mile paddle race or a bike tour. Tons of awesome prizes are donated by local businesses - if you hang around for the awards ceremony you're likely to get a fun prize! All proceeds benefit the Mystic River Watershed Association, a local nonprofit organization celebrating its 40th Anniversary in 2012.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Mystic River Herring Run & Paddle, May 20
